pr_title: Add integration tests for stress package

timeline.message: Add integration tests for stress package

timeline.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: I think we should be using different name then output since output is used multiple times here to mean different things.
timeline.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: generateAndVerifyReport looks exactly the same between all 3 of these integration tests and probably would benefit from having a common super class.
timeline.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText: Thanks! I forgot to refactor this out... I fixed it now.
replies.author: gpang
